EmailTemplate.name: 2019_NBAA_Keselowski_Invite.2019_NBAA_Keselowski_Reminder_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder - Honeywell NBAA Program "Learn How Checkered Flag Aviation Wins with Primus Elite"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> LOOKING FORWARD TO SEEING YOU AT NBAA 2019 Hello,
My pilot, Joey Meier, and I are looking forward to meeting you at NBAA for our program: "Learn How Checkered Flag Aviation Wins with Primus Elite."
Pick up your credentials in Room #N256 at 1:45 - 2 p.m., Tuesday, October 22, Las Vegas Convention Center.
Please contact Ed.Borger@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Ed.Borger@Honeywell.com]]> if you have any questions.
See you there!
Brad Keselowski
